backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor defining data types (Animal, AstCloudOrder, Address, etc.) and endpoints for user profiles and orders, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and blob storage via MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report tracking two features: generating a new clear-resin headstone mold product image and updating ShapeShowcases.tsx to use that new image (ponce-headstone-mold.dim_800x900.png).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and recent changes, serving as a reference for build planning and feature tracking.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes using OKLCH values for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell with the page title 'Furever Keepsakes and Memorials - Pet Memorials' and a root div that mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with routes for the main page, payment success/failure, and a profile setup modal for newly authenticated users, plus admin Stripe configuration via PaymentSetup.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Site footer with branding, smooth-scroll quick links, a caffeine.ai attribution, and a contact email section linking to all4funflorida@gmail.com.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Sticky navigation header with the 'Furever Keepsakes and Memorials' brand logo and smooth-scroll nav links for About, Designs, Order, and Process sections; no login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Marketing section that displays three feature cards (Crystal Clear Resin, Natural Elements, Printed Photographs) explaining the materials and craftsmanship used in pet memorials.
Hero section with headline, tagline, description, and two CTA buttons (Explore Designs, How It's Made) alongside a product image of a resin memorial.
Marketing section displaying a four-step process (Capture, Print, Place, Pour & Cure) for creating resin pet memorials, rendered as a 2-column card grid.
Marketing section showcasing four resin memorial shape options (Square, Heart, Hexagon, Headstone) with images, names, descriptions, and badges in a card grid.
Order submission form collecting pet info, buyer details, shipping address, photo upload (with preview and progress), and payment method, then submitting via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentF: Payment failure page that displays an error message and two buttons to retry or return home, wrapped in the site's Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentM: Radio group component for selecting between Stripe (credit/debit card) and PayPal payment methods, with styled option cards.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentS: Admin-only component that shows a banner and dialog for configuring Stripe payment by entering a secret key and allowed countries, only visible when Stripe is not yet configured.
Full-page success screen displayed after a completed payment, showing a confirmation message and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile management, order submission, Stripe configuration, admin checks, and checkout session creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for a warm neutral light/dark color theme using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for sensitive values like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch variables, typography, container queries, animation plugins, and custom font families.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for the Ponce Headstone Mold project, including existing features for generating and displaying a clear resin headstone mold image with flowers, grass, and a Yorkie portrait in a black frame.
